import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; const Form = () => { const name = useRef(); const mobileNumber = useRef(); const address = useRef(); const city = useRef(); const state = useRef(); const postalCode = useRef(); const [AddressType, setAddressType] = useState(); const [AddressStatus, setAddressStatus] = useState(); const addressTypeHandler = (event) => { setAddressType(event.target.value); }; const addressStatusHandler = (event) => { setAddressStatus(event.target.value); } console.log(AddressType); return (
); }; export default Form;
